pages.title: Combat
pages.text: Your companion automatically fights hostile mobs that come near or attack it.$(br2)It targets all monsters within range and will also hunt passive animals for food when hungry.$(br2)Give your companion weapons and armor through its inventory for better combat effectiveness.

pages.title: Auto-Equip
pages.text: Every 5 seconds, the companion scans its inventory and equips:$(br2)$(li)$(bold)Best weapon$() — Highest attack damage$(li)$(bold)Best armor$() — Highest defense for each slot (head, chest, legs, feet)$(br2)Simply put good gear in the companion's inventory and it will equip it automatically.
